title: Ozone logo
content:
Hi

(Excuse my english)

I try to find the typography of the Ozone logo

[http://funsport4all.de/media/Ozone/OZ\_Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001233/http:/funsport4all.de/media/Ozone/OZ_Logo.jpg "http://funsport4all.de/media/Ozone/OZ\_Logo.jpg")

Thanks for you help
author: Baldy

comments.content: Don't know this one, looks custom to me. Some candidates for customization (mainly redrawing almost all letters from /O and slanting): [Neuropolitical](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001233/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/neuropolitical), [Usuzi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001233/http:/www.dafont.com/suzuki.font), [Korataki](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001233/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/korataki), [Orbit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001233/http:/vllg.com/system/font_families/pdfs/42/original/vllg_Orbit.pdf) (PDF, no longer available to sell)
